block.p: Lynn Elizabeth Koridek, a daughter of Sylvia and Joseph Koridek of Mendham, N.J., is to be married this evening to Andrew Marc Roth, the son of Marsha and Steven Roth of New York. The Rev. Martin Rauscher, a Roman Catholic priest, is to officiate at the Madison Hotel in Morristown, N.J., with Rabbi Joel Goor taking part in the service.

Ms. Koridek, 30, is a sales analyst in the customer marketing department of the Warner-Lambert Consumer Group in Parsippany, N.J., a division of the Pfizer pharmaceuticals company. She graduated from Purdue University.

Lynn Elizabeth Koridek, a daughter of Sylvia and Joseph Koridek of Mendham, N.J., is to be married this evening to Andrew Marc Roth, the son of Marsha and Steven Roth of New York. The Rev. Martin Rauscher, a Roman Catholic priest, is to officiate at the Madison Hotel in Morristown, N.J., with Rabbi Joel Goor taking part in the service.

Ms. Koridek, 30, is a sales analyst in the customer marketing department of the Warner-Lambert Consumer Group in Parsippany, N.J., a division of the Pfizer pharmaceuticals company. She graduated from Purdue University.

Mr. Roth, 29, is the producer of Major League Baseball Radio, a venture run by Major League Baseball in New York that transmits local radio coverage of baseball games over the Internet. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania.
